title: Not sure how to disable the AI summarize pop-up after disabling the AI summarizer
content:
Hello,

I disabled the AI summarizer almost immediately after seeing it because:

  1. It was not able to summarize the page
  2. It blocked the information I actually needed to see on the page

However, shortly after disabling it I got a pop-up ad advertising the feature! (attached)

Related Question: Want to remove or disable AI summarizer

title: MOZILLA WON'T OPEN MY PREVIOUS TABS...
content:
I used to leave many tabs opened in my browser so that when I got back I could easily find the one I wanted to use.

Now I can't because the Mozilla browser just won't save them. So each time that I open the browser they are all gone...

... Is there somersetting I can DO????
creator: jvazquezb50

title: Lost Tabs
content: It has always been the case that when I closed Firefox, it asked if I wanted my open files saved and reopened when I opened the browser again. I needed to restart my laptop and I decided to close Firefox first. It asked if tabs should be saved and I said yes. After I restarted the laptop and reopened Firefox, all of my open tabs (I think about 35) were gone. Can I get them back?
creator: fredklass52

title: Websites not displaying correctly after Firefox update
content: After the latest Firefox update, some websites are not displaying correctly (fonts/images/layout broken). I already tried clearing cache and disabling extensions, but the issue remains. Is this a known problem, and what else can I try to fix it?
creator: mrcharming746
